title: Cardamom and honey chicken thighs with green beans and quinoa
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon honey', '2 tablespoons tamari', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '8 cardamom pods', 'coconut oil / olive oil', 'sea salt and black pepper', '2 chicken thigh fillets, halved', '1 red pepper, chopped', '120g green beans, trimmed', '80g quinoa', '20g flaked almonds']
